title: I got suspended because i was joking with my friend in team chat
body: Hello everybody.So today i got suspended for 2 weeks because i was joking around with my friend Shaco(Nitroblaster) in the game and Riot thought i was flaming or swearing.I would never flame or swear...I also have level 5 honor and grinded so hard to reach plat 3 nearly 2 and Riot just suspends me and gets all my free rewards that i worked hard to get.I would like to have a little help if its possible by someone that is from Riot.Also i sent a ticket at Riot Support but it say <> but at my email it says that is confirmed.Anyway thanks for all the help if its any!

replies.body: I know it can seem weird at first, but even if you were directing those comments at a friend it can be taken offensively by them or others. I'm not actually able to read that chat log very clearly, but if you want more context you can always hit up the EUNE agents in a ticket!
